TopicTitle: My World Glitches Out When Ever I Launch a Craft

Articles.Content:
There are floating pieces of terrain that you can go through but it leaves huge square holes in the world I have tried to take mods out but nothing has worked. I have changes the settings for the terrain but nothing is working i'm going to list as much info so you can help me out here:

Computer:

  • 480 Radeon Graphics Card
  • i5 intel core 

There is much more but I don't know what it is.

Mods:

  • B9PartSwitch
  • EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements
  • Firespitter
  • B9_Aerospace_Legacy
  • KerbalJointReinforcement
  • KSPAPIExtensions-master
  • KWRocketry
  • MechJeb2
  • ModuleAnimateEmissive
  • NEBULA
  • OPT
  • ProceduralParts
  • scatterer
  • StockVisualEnhancements
  • TweakScale
  • WarpPlugin
  • ModuleManager.2.5.1

Sorry I couldn't work out how to do photos 

Version 1.3.1

Sounds like Scatterer to me.

I've heard others mention this issue with that particular mod.
